item.title: Fly-tipped waste - Hoblingwell pavilion, 30th October
item.description:
Waste has been left outside the pavillion and well as in and around a park bin at Hoblingwell Wood Recreation Ground. This has also been reported to the person who's name is shown on multiple items as this is a repeat problem. Please could this be addressed?

item.title: Long over grown trees spilling into my garden, 30th October
item.description:
The trees behind my property drop a large amount of leaves into my garden (number 14) every year. The buildup of leaves makes it difficult to use the garden and even to go out the back door to take out the rubbish. I would like to request that the council consider cutting back or removing these trees to help prevent this ongoing problem.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 6, Grosvenor Park, Camberwell, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A lot of leaves, 30th October
item.description:
There is a large buildup of fallen leaves on the street and pavement outside my house. The leaves are making the area slippery and difficult to walk on. My mum is currently on crutches and is finding it very hard to get from the house to the car safely, as she has to step into the road to avoid majority of the leaves. We would appreciate it if the area could be cleared as soon as possible for safety reasons.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 6, Grosvenor Park, Camberwell, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: St Pancras Campus, 30th October
item.description:

item.description:
